item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Compatible # React — ReactJS React Native — React Native for mobile Benchmarks # Benchmarks to compare with other schemas validators (the performance can variate slightly depending on the machine). Normal # @resourge/schema x 18,634,802 ops/sec ±1.30% (93 runs sampled) Fast Validator x 1,632,544 ops/sec ±0.50% (92 runs sampled) joi x 182,179 ops/sec ±1.15% (93 runs sampled) zod x 52,358 ops/sec ±0.86% (89 runs sampled) Yup x 8,573 ops/sec ±4.42% (81 runs sampled) Fastest is [ '@resourge/schema' ] Heavy (done with an array with 10 000 items) # @resourge/schema x 2,594 ops/sec ±0.
